heading: Abadala bamisela ababingeleli neetitshala ngokubekwa kwezandla. Malunga E.K. 401–421.

verses.txt: Uhlobo abathi ngalo abafundi, ababebizwa ngokuba ngabadala bebandla, bamisela ababingeleli neetitshala—
Emva kokuba bethandazile kuye uBawo egameni likaKrestu, babeka izandla zabo phezu kwabo, baza bathi:

Egameni likaYesu Krestu ndiya kumisela ukuba ube ngumbingeleli, (okanye, ukuba uyititshala, ndiya kumisela ukuba ube yititshala) ukuba ushumayele inguquko noxolelo lwezono ngoYesu Krestu, ngonyamezelo lokholo egameni lakhe kuye esiphelweni. Amen.
Kwaye ngolu hlobo baye bamisela ababingeleli neetitshala, ngokwezipho nobizo lukaThixo kubo abantu; kwaye babamisela ngamandla oMoya oyiNgcwele, owaye ukubo.
